description: One advert depicts an elderly man looking back on the winter of 2020, while saying "we did nothing".
title: Coronavirus: Germany hails couch potatoes in new videos
title_page: Coronavirus: Germany hails couch potatoes in new videos - BBC News
maintext: "And when the virus spread, I remained the same lazy sack of potatoes that I was before. But unlike me, the world had changed: to contain the virus, people were urged to stay at home, doing nothing suddenly became a public service, laziness could save lives and I was a champion in that."
